db:info.db:title: Qt WebView C++ Classes and Namespaces

db:abstract.db:para: Provides a helper function to set up and use the WebView.

db:article.db:para: Provides a helper function to set up and use the WebView.

db:listitem.db:para: The QtWebView namespace provides functions that makes it easier to set-up and use the WebView.

db:section.db:title: Detailed Description
db:section.db:para: The Qt WebView module provides functionality to initialize the backend for using the WebView QML type.
